indic_transliteration.sanscript.schemes.roman¶

class indic_transliteration.sanscript.schemes.roman.HkScheme[source]¶
indic_transliteration.sanscript.schemes.roman.ITRANS = 'itrans'¶

Optitransv1 is described in https://sanskrit-coders.github.io/site/pages/input/optitrans.html#optitrans-v1 . OPTITRANS, while staying close to ITRANS it provides a more intuitive transliteration compared to ITRANS (shankara manju - शङ्कर मञ्जु).

class indic_transliteration.sanscript.schemes.roman.IastScheme(kolkata_variant=False)[source]¶

fix_lazy_anusvaara(data_in)[source]¶
class indic_transliteration.sanscript.schemes.roman.OptitransScheme[source]¶
to_lay_indian(text, jn_replacement='GY', t_replacement='t')[source]¶
class indic_transliteration.sanscript.schemes.roman.RomanScheme(data=None, synonym_map=None, name=None)[source]¶
get_standard_form(data)[source]¶

Roman schemes define multiple representations of the same devanAgarI character. This method get’s a library-standard representation.

data : a text in the given scheme.
